EmailTemplate.name: School Tour Response email first tour of 2018
EmailTemplate.subject: Head of School Tour request
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
{!Lead.CreatedDate}
Dear {!Lead.FirstName},
Thank you for considering St Andrews Cathedral School for your child’s education and development.
We have received your request for a tour and we are currently scheduling our 2018 tour dates. We will email you soon when bookings open.
In the meantime, if there's anything else we can help you with, please do not hesitate to contact us.
To keep up to date with what’s happening across our K-12 St Andrew’s community, visit our facebook page. It’s updated daily during term time with news, photos, events and mini videos.
Yours Sincerely,
Robyn Pedley Enrolments Manager
